title: kopipe
author: kopipe
content: I will pay $50 in BTC for PDF copies of the ISO standard ISO/IEC 18181.I only want ISO/IEC 18181.I DO NOT WANT the drafts.Yes I know it costs more than that. Get creative.

comments.author: kopipe
comments.body: Still seeking. User @TheChin0s can stop attempting to scam me over email/DM.
